text:
how does HubSpot deal with emails where the content has properties of a primary object and also needs to include associated records. Here's an example:

Say I have a `Company` that represents a Real Estate Agent, and i have deals that represents the various current listings that the agent has on the market.  I want to include an email that has some properties of the `Company` (i.e. Agent) and all their Listings (i.e. deal records associated with that company) in a single email.

How would do go about doing this? I'm relatively new to email building so any pointers would be super helpful.
When i try to access the email details of a contact using the engagements api inside a custom code action in a workflow is it necessary to specify api_key for authorization?
